Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
73 Sanidassanattika, Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānadukādi
Sanidassanattika, Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānadukādi
119.
287Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
288Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
120.
289Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
290Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
121.
291Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
292Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
